api_data package¶

Submodules¶

api_data.views_admin module¶

api_data.views_admin.get_all_events(request)¶

Function will return Http response , informing wether or not data collection was successful

Returns

returning an http response depending on wether we got data from the api or not

Return type

HttpResponse

api_data.views_admin.get_and_save_event_information(data)¶

Function takes raw JSON data from ticketmaster API, parses the useful data and stores it into the database

Parameters

data (Dictionary) – Json data we got from the database

api_data.views_admin.get_event_data()¶

Makes a request to Ticketmaster api, returns all the JSON data, or none if the data was not reachable

Returns

either we return a dictionary with all the json data, or a HttpResponse with an error code

Return type

Dictionary
